entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pointer type is parsed as LHS of multiply expression in `is` context #70049
  • Exception and several gold bars when using relational pattern on pointer type #70048
  • Feature 'Diagnostic analyzer runner' fails with gold bar when encountering list pattern on pointer type #70046
  • Autocompletion suggests keywords `and`/`or` after arrow of pointer member access in pattern matching #70045
    Backlog
  • Duplicate build errors are not collapsed in the error list #70044
  • Incorporate known spec violations #70043
  • Closing a document brings back stale diagnostics #70042
  • Add new applicable_kinds to distinguish between parameter of regular functions and parameters of anonymous functions #70037
  • Will IDE0305 not support Prepend? #70035
    Backlog
  • Wrong Error Message when bind ref struct's method to delegate #70034
  • C#: "Move to Namespace" does not appear for classes marked partial #70033

Closed

  • Reduce `int[]` allocations from BadArguments #69969
  • Analyzer errors while working in Roslyn: VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer throws InvalidCastException #70015
  • `GetTypeInfo` returns `TypeInfo` with null as `Type` for `ImplicitObjectCreationExpression` inside `CollectionExpression` #70041
  • ApiDesignGuidelines.BasicOverrideEqualsOnOverloadingOperatorEqualsAnalyzer throws NRE #70029

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Microsoft.DevDiv.Optimization.Data.PowerShell to 1.0803 #70051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add "Primary Constructors" to Compiler Test Plan.md #70050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prevent infinite lookup cycle through bases of a containing type of an enum or a delegate type. #70047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initialize usage of ProjectDependencyGraph.Empty to start with a null reverseReferencesMap #70036
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70031
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, 17.8

Merged

  • [Performance] Reduce array allocations of BadArguments #69970
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70026
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Update msbuild locator to include SDK probing location changes #70038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Bump the NuGet.Frameworks version #70023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'use object/collection initializer' in VB. #70028
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to latest 8.0 preview version of MS.CA.NetAnalyzers package #70030
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Use vs-threading extensions where available #69932
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize allocations in TextReader.ReadToEnd utilized by SourceText.From #70017
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support converting collection-initializers to collection-expressions in more cases. #69983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle property without accessors in `Binder.ReceiverIsSubjectToCloning` #70009
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove indexer filtering from lookup #69947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to work with interpolated strings. #70006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix declaration snippets after `partial` keyword #69874
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
